structure.unit: Real And Personal Property And Domestic Relations
Descent And Distribution, Wills, Estates Of Deceased Persons And Absentees, Guardianship, Conservatorship And Trusts

law.text: [ Text of section effective until March 31, 2012. Repealed by 2008, 521, Sec. 17. See 2008, 521, Sec. 44 as amended by 2010, 409, Sec. 23 and 2011, 224.] The court shall in such cases order the executor or administrator to give to creditors notice of the times when and places where their claims will be examined, in the same manner as is required of commissioners.
